AIPlayMaker.description: JSON RESTFUL API for board game AIs, built with Flask and PyTorch. It implements the Minimax algorithm with alpha-beta pruning and Monte Carlo Tree Search for optimal move generation. The codebase is well-documented with unit tests for all endpoints.

Ugram.description: An Instagram clone built with the MERN stack. It allows users to upload, share, and like photos, with search functionality, user profiles, and responsive design.

CADE.description: A backend service for processing and automating contact form messages. It integrates with Discord for GitHub events and uses GPT for automated email responses. CADE includes Jest testing, Winston logging, and GitHub Actions for CI/CD.

Nootfolio.description: A modern, responsive, and performant web portfolio built with React and TypeScript. It highlights projects, skills, and a contact form, focusing on user experience and accessibility.

Desjardins-Internship.description: As a Functional Analyst within the Gryphonds team, focusing on investment and reinvestment web projects. My role involved bridging business needs and technical implementation by refining requirements, documenting features, and ensuring alignment between stakeholders.
keyContributions: Conducted functional analysis and collaborated with developers to refine business logic.
Improved documentation and helped streamline communication between teams.
Contributed to the delivery of a major feature reducing steps in the reinvestment process.
Worked in an Agile environment, adapting to evolving requirements and tight deadlines.

Nootflix.description: Working on a replacement for streaming services like Netflix, Disney+, and Amazon Prime Video that will be used by a small group of friends. Currently working on the backend APIs
